column2: speech_text(string)
Bah! Our esteemed ally has turned about, leaving us to the mercy of our foes!
Our ally has fallen to the enemy my lord! A terrible loss!
We have captured a building, my lord!
Their general has fallen! A devastating loss for the enemy!
The enemy has lost a vital ally, my lord!
Their ally has abandoned them! Now we have them!
They have captured a building, my lord!
They now control a key position, my lord!
The fort is but moments from being ours, sir!
Onwards, sir, onwards, the fort is falling!
The gates are ours!
My lord, their general has fallen! A cutting blow!
My Lord; the enemy army contains the deadly gatling gun weapon
Hidden units, my lord, treacherously meant to ambush us!
Naval bombardment incoming!
Beware! Enemy reinforcements have arrived my lord!
We have captured their tower, my lord!
Our weapons made short work of their tower!
The walls are destroyed! Into the breach!
All hope is failing, my lord! The battle is almost done!
Our general is under threat, my lord! He is too important to lose!
Our general has fallen, my lord! Our men are shaken by this terrible event!
The enemy has discovered our ally's hidden troops!
Our allies are under attack!
My lord! Our ally has fled, abandoning us to the enemy!
Sir! We cannot hold this position much longer!
Sir, our defences are breached and failing!
Our gate has fallen to the enemy!
Our general is in grave danger, my lord!
Our general has been injured, my lord! He lives, but must leave the battle!
This is a black day! Our general has fallen , my lord.
Our hidden units have been discovered my lord!
Sir! The enemy have called in a bombardment. It may target our position!
Reinforcements have arrived!
Our ship has been destroyed! All hands are lost!
One of our ships has chosen dishonour, my lord!
Here they come! Prepare to repel boarders!
Our ship has exploded!
One of our ships has lost its sails! It may not last much longer in such a state!
Fire! One of our ships has been set ablaze!
One of our ships is withdrawing!
Beware! Our ship is in range of a coastal battery
Our tower has fallen to their fire!
The enemy have taken a tower!
The men are fatigued, my lord, and some must rest!
We cannot see our targets but will try to hit them
Our entire unit has perished, my lord!
One of our units have used all its ammunition, my lord.
Our men are running from the battlefield: a shameful display!
One of our units is under suppression fire!
Our walls crumble under the pounding of their weapons!
My Lord, a friendly reminder that you are the attacker
My Lord, a friendly reminder that you are the defender
Beware! A torpedo approaches our fleet
The weather looks ominous, my lord! We should be wary of misfires.
My lord, a glorious victory will soon be yours!
